title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Problem-Based Learning for Pediatric Cardiology Education Assessment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Analyze pediatric cardiology clinical cases using problem-based learning (PBL) and design evaluation criteria
Perform patient care scenarios in a clinical simulation environment and conduct self- and peer assessments of performance
Propose a competency assessment system for trainees by applying the concept of Entrustable Professional Activities (EPAs)
Design a feedback system combining formative and summative assessment methods tailored to online environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
